concept.title: Group Member View
concept.abstract: The Group Member View is configured by the Administrator in the Community Group record.

conbody.p:
Administrators can define how search results and tile views display on the Members tab of the Community Group Detail page in the Community Portal through:
Search Results Sort Field-Defines the field to sort group member search results in ascending or descending order. Defaults to the Group Name field.
Search Results Sort Order-Defines the order in which the search results will be displayed. The default is "ASC" for "Ascending."
Member Search Display Fields (CSV)-Defines the fields to be displayed on the group member tiles in the group members page using comma separated values of field API names.
Show Search Filters-Enables or disables the sidebar nav filters for the Member Search page. The default is "Enabled."
Search Results-Defines the maximum number of results that are returned for search results on the Members tab. The default is set to "10."
Member Search Filter Fields (CSV)-Defines the group member field API names to present on the sidebar nav.
Staff users can change the fields within the sidebar visible to users on the Members tab by configuring the Search Filters on the Community Group record.

On the Community Group record, populate the social media fields for them to appear within the banner of the Community Group Detail page. The social media links supported are:
Twitter Profile URL
LinkedIn Profile URL
Google+ Profile URL
Clicking on one of the social media icons will direct Community Portal Users to the URL defined on the Community Group record in a separate tab in the browser window.
conbody.note: On the Community Group record, populate the Email field with the email address associated with the Group. The Email field is displayed on the banner of the Community Group Detail page, adjacent to the Group Name.
